modnlp.tc.dstruct
Class ParsedDocument

java.lang.Object
  modnlp.tc.dstruct.ParsedDocument
public class ParsedDocument
extends java.lang.Object

Store text (as a StringBuffer), its id (as a String), and the categories to which it belongs (as a vector)
